meanings.definition: individuals who assist in the maintenance of a synagogue
meanings.sent1: The shammosim cleaned the synagogue every morning.
meanings.sent2: The dedicated shammosim ensure the synagogue is well-kept.
meanings.sent3: The shammosim decided to have a race while cleaning the synagogue.
meanings.sent4: The shammosim's dedication shines like a beacon in the synagogue.
meanings.sent5: The shammosim's hard work makes the synagogue sparkle.

meanings.definition: to perform the duties of a shammos
meanings.sent1: I will shammosim at the synagogue this weekend.
meanings.sent2: He shammosims with great care and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: She likes to shammosim while singing her favorite songs.
meanings.sent4: The way he shammosims shows his respect for the synagogue.
meanings.sent5: Shammosiming requires dedication and a love for the synagogue.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of shammosim
meanings.sent1: The shammosim duties are important in the synagogue.
meanings.sent2: She wore a shammosim uniform during the service.
meanings.sent3: The shammosim cat seemed to enjoy helping around the synagogue.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to the synagogue was truly shammosim.
meanings.sent5: The shammosim atmosphere in the synagogue was peaceful and welcoming.
